character.age: exact age in integer value or description

physical-appearance.eye-color: exact eye color in string value (e.g., blue, brown)
physical-appearance.hair-color: hair color in string value (e.g., black, blonde)
physical-appearance.height: height in float value (e.g., 1.85 for 6 feet 0 inches)
physical-appearance.weight: weight in float value (e.g., 70.3 for 155 lbs)
